name: Tamobomination
description:
The Institute of Genetic Research is proud to unveil its newest model of the Convenient Digital Household Pet Companion, using the genetic traits of both man and animal alike. The latest model is shown to have such high levels of intelligence that it doesn't even need you to care for it, will not expire, and can even duplicate itself for its own personal companions. 

...Why are you even here? Go away. (It has, however, grown an affinity to 'petting'.)

MADE FOR INPUT OPTIONAL JAM 2019

NOTE:

- best viewed at 1600x900 resolution, the border seems to disappear with anything too small and I haven't been able to adjust it in time.

CREDITS:

RainbowCemetery - code help because what is a unity engine
Clayzulah - music! because i ran out of time for sound.
